AI Description: SMRT Link is a software suite designed for the analysis of Single-Molecule Real-Time (SMRT) sequencing data obtained from PacBio sequencers. It serves as a central hub for data processing, analysis, visualization, and storage in bioinformatics applications.
Core Features: Centralized Platform For Pacbio Sequencing Data Analysis, Data Processing & Quality Control Tools, Variant Detection & Genome Assembly, Interactive Visualization Tools, Support For Long-Read Sequencing Data Analysis
General Tags: Bioinformatics, High-Throughput Sequencing, Data Analysis, Genomics
